text: @SpeakerPelosi @Morning_Joe No one was properly prepared for the coronavirus but you playing politics with it to get your green new deal, abortion, Kennedy Center and paying illegal immigrants agenda is disgraceful. You/Democrats have held up aid to people affected by the coronavirus for over 3 weeks.
